about_the_game:
Welcome to your life... T-there is n-no t-tur-r-r... Rebooting... You are a rogue robot who has fled the iron grip of the Imperium and found refuge on a shattered world. To earn your place among humanity, you must transport the most precious cargo across treacherous city. Cargo is also your lifeline, since you need energy to survive. Some will welcome you with open arms, while others will see you as a threat to be eliminated.

Pay your rent and wages of others!

While you are delivering cargoes, you should upgrade your store, get more reputation and customers and hire more robots to establish your own brand. But don't forget that they come with their problems. You should pay for their wages and energy costs.

Use tools to deliver more and more cargo!

You got tools! You got a robot dog, capable of carrying lots of load and a car you can use in order to deliver more cargo and earn more! But they cost you money and energy. You should upkeep them!

Procedural Animations & Physics

In Empire: Sound of the North - A Cargo Delivery Simulator, each step you take is procedurally animated, making every movement unique and dynamic. That's why you must carefully and strategically consider every step you take.

Earn Reputation, Master Your Skills

As you deliver your cargo through the neon-lit streets of the cyberpunk city, you'll soak in the vibrant sights and pulsating beats of an electrifying soundtrack. Along the way, you'll build your reputation, unlocking advanced cybernetic upgrades and essential tools to navigate the city's dangers and enhance your capabilities. Step by step, you'll fight to find equilibrium in this relentless urban sprawl.

Deliveries

As a cargo delivery simulation, the game places you in the role of a robot navigating a fractured Cyberpunk world to deliver essential cargoes. In this game, your energy is your lifeline, and careful consideration of terrain is vital to ensure your deliveries arrive intact. Or you could lose your footing, fall, and face destruction. Worse yet, your precious cargo and vital energy would be lost, jeopardizing everything you've worked for.

Story

While diving into the story and lore is optional, every delivery comes with a unique description that unveils pieces of the game's narrative and world. For those who love to read, our in-game mailing system offers an additional layer of depth. Discover the universe through messages from other characters, each revealing intriguing details about their lives, struggles, and the world you inhabit.

Protect Your Cargo From Bandits!

Battle the relentless robots of the Imperium, determined to strip you of your lifeline and stop your mission. Outsmart their advanced tactics, defend your cargo, and prove that even a rogue robot can stand against the might of an empire!


So...
